title: EventBridge Scheduler to send messages to Amazon SQS
description: Simple pattern that publishes a message to an SQS queue every 5 minutes

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern demonstrates how to send a message to an Amazon SQS queue every 5 minutes using EventBridge Scheduler and deployed using the AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM).
See the Github repo for detailed deployment instructions.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Tadhg O'Brien
authors.bio: Tadhg is a Technical Account Manager at Amazon Web Services supporting Public Sector customers and has a passion for Serverless
